title: Dayara Bugyal
subtitle: Endless alpine meadows
about: Dayara Bugyal is a vast, rolling meadow famous for its open vistas and easy walking. It’s a gentle trek that rewards with 360° mountain views and tranquil campsites on soft grassy slopes.
seo_description: Large grassy meadows with broad Himalayan views, ideal for calm overnight camping and family treks.

trek_places.name: Main Bugyal
trek_places.short: Open grasslands stretching to the horizon
trek_places.about: The main meadow is the scenic heart of the trek—soft ground, easy walking, and unobstructed views of the surrounding ranges. Perfect for slow walking and broad photos.
what_to_do: Camp in the meadow under clear skies
